definition: Corsica (Island located west of Italy and southeast of France)
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: The first leg of the Tour de France bicycle race began on the French island of Corsica today.
sentences.chinese: 今天，環法自行車比賽第一賽段從法屬科西嘉島開始。

sentences.english: The French-held island of Corsica appears as a dark mass rimmed with light near the top of the frame.
sentences.chinese: 照片上方被燈火鑲邊的黑暗區域是法屬科西嘉島。

sentences.english: If the weather were fine, more travellers can Corsica.
sentences.chinese: 如果天氣晴朗，更可以遠眺科西嘉島。

sentences.english: Corsica Island on the Mediterranean is maximal island and islet of France.
sentences.chinese: 地中海上的科西嘉島是法國最大島嶼。
